title: Verify Data Source Connection
description: A dashboard is showing an error. An analyst needs to verify that the connection to the underlying data source is still active.

tasks.description: Identify the dashboard that is showing the error.
Navigate to the data source management section for that dashboard.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the list of data sources connected to the dashboard.

tasks.description: Find the data source that is showing a 'failed' status and refresh its credentials.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the broken connection, re-authenticates with the data source, and resolves the error.
